There are almost 50 students including btech and a dual degree in ceramics in every batch and around 17 teachers. So it's almost 1 teacher who has 3 students i.e. 3:1. The exams are held twice a sem i.e. mid-semester and end-semester and also a summer semester only for back papers. The exams are fairly difficult and require thorough concepts.
